title: Emotes
body: How do I take off this thumbs up thing? It is where my active items goes and so every time I try to use it the thumbs up thing goes off and after my first game I was being threatened with getting reported for it. I can not find how to shut it off and I am getting annoyed.

replies.body: If you go into the new Emote tab in your Collection, right click on the emotes and that will remove them. Make sure to hit Save!
